derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: modern Latin, named after Klas on Alstroemer (1736–96), Swedish naturalist

means.word_mean: 1. any of various South American plants of the genus Alstroemeria valued for their handsome umbels of beautiful flowers
